# Sun's Disdain (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Curse Spells|curse]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Bloodrager Spells|Bloodrager 2]], [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[2nd Level Inquisitor Spells|Inquisitor 2]], [[2nd Level Shaman Spells|Shaman 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Witch Spells|Witch 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 3]], [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a piece of glass)/DF

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** Permanent

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Adventurer's Guide, pg. 17

You alter a creature so the touch of the sun is hostile to it. The cursed creature gains [[S3.1G-M - Universal Monster Rules G-M (Bestiary 6 Apx)|light blindness]] and is [[Blinded|blinded]] for 1 round if exposed to bright light, such as sunlight or the *[[Daylight (Spell)|daylight]]* spell. The cursed creature is [[Dazzled|dazzled]] as long as it remains in areas of bright light, and it is treated as being particularly susceptible to sunlight for the purposes of resolving spells like [[Searing Light (Spell)|searing light]], *[[Sunbeam (Spell)|sunbeam]]*, and *[[Sunburst (Spell)|sunburst]]*.
